details.content: France and Croatia will take unchanged lineups into the World Cup final.

details.title: Lineups
details.content:
France: Hugo Lloris, Benjamin Pavard, Raphael Varane, Samuel Umtiti, Paul Pogba, Antoine Griezmann, Olivier Giroud, Kylian Mbappe, N'Golo Kante, Blaise Matuidi, Lucas Hernandez.

Croatia: Danijel Subasic, Sime Vrsaljko, Ivan Strinic, Ivan Perisic, Dejan Lovren, Ivan Rakitic, Luka Modric, Marcelo Brozovic, Mario Mandzukic, Ante Rebic, Domagoj Vida.
Russian President Vladimir Putin will help present the trophy to the winning captain after the World Cup final.
France and Croatia are on the field at Luzhniki Stadium to warm up for World Cup final with under an hour to go before kickoff.
The closing ceremony for the World Cup has started.
Artists perform prior the final match between France and Croatia at the 2018 soccer World Cup in the Luzhniki Stadium in Moscow, Russia. (Photo | AP)
France and Croatia's players line up on the field for the national anthems.

Former German team captain Philipp Lahm and Russian model Natalia Vodianova display the trophy before the final match between France and Croatia at the 2018 FIFA World Cup in the Luzhniki Stadium in Moscow, Russia. (Photo | AP)

details.title: FIFA WORLD CUP 2018 FINAL KICKS OFF!!
details.content: France is aiming to win its second World Cup and first since 1998. Croatia has never before gone past the semifinal stage.
Croatia's Mario Mandzukic has taken the kickoff for his team in the World Cup final against France.

details.title: GOOALLL!! FRANCE 18'
details.content: France open their account at just the 18th minute!
France get on top thanks to an own goal from Mario Mandzukic! An Antoine Griezmann freekick ends up in the goal with a touch from Mandzukic!
It is the 12th own goal of the World Cup, an all-time record.
It is also the first goal in regulation in a World Cup final since 2006 — the 2010 and 2014 finals were both extra time 1-0 results.

details.title: GOAALLL!! CROATIA 29'
details.content: Croatia level the score! Ivan Perisic scores!

Domagoj Vida got the ball at a free kick and passed it back to Perisic on the edge of the area. The winger controlled the ball with his right foot and used his left to fire it past French goalkeeper Hugo Lloris.
Croatia's Ivan Perisic, second left, scores his side's first goal during the final match between France and Croatia. (Photo | AP)
It's the third goal in seven games for Ivan Perisic and the first goal France has conceded since its 4-3 win over Argentina in the round of 16.

details.title: GOAALL!! FRANCE 38'
details.content: Antoine Griezmann scoress off a penalty to give France the lead!
Antoine Griezmann has given France a 2-1 lead over Croatia with a penalty after the first call made using a video review in a World Cup final.
Griezmann hit the ball hard and left as Croatian goalkeeper Danijel Subasic jumped the other way in the 38th minute.
France's Antoine Griezmann, left, scores his side's second goal from the penalty spot past Croatia goalkeeper Danijel Subasic, right, during the final match between France and Croatia. (Photo | AP)

details.title: HALF TIME: France 2-1 Croatia
details.content: France leads Croatia 2-1 at halftime as it works toward its first World Cup title in 20 years.

details.title: Controversial VAR decision
details.content: Croatia's Ivan Perisic was penalised for handball after a lengthy VAR review, and it was after the penalty was awarded that France's Antoine Griezmann slotted the spot-kick into the corner to put France 2-1 ahead.

details.title: SECOND HALF KICKS OFF
details.content: Croatia would be looking to equalize, while one more goal can help France run away with the game. It's time for the second half to kick off!
Croatia's Mario Mandzukic bumps into France goalkeeper Hugo Lloris as the two battle for a high ball and there’s a break in play as Lloris receives treatment.
Four people dressed in suits have invaded the pitch during the second half of the World Cup final.

details.title: GOOALLL!! FRANCE 59'
details.content: France inches further away from Croatia!
Paul Pogba has given France a 3-1 lead over Croatia in the World Cup final with a goal in the 59th minute.

details.title: GOAALLL!! FRANCE 4-1 65'
details.content: France are looking to seal the game! Kylian Mbappe scores their fourth goal!
Kylian Mbappe becomes the first teenager to score in a FIFA World Cup final since Brazilian legend Pele did!

details.title: GOOALLL! CROATIA 69'
details.content: Croatia strike back! Mario Mandzukic slams one in to give the tiny country hope!
Mario Mandzukic takes advantage of French goalkeeper Hugo Lloris' errors to settle the score with his previous own goal.

details.title: LESS THAN 10 MINUTES ON THE CLOCK!
details.content:
The ball goes back and forth across the field as both teams engage in an intense battle with only a few minutes left for the final whistle!

Croatia's Mario Mandzukic, right, controls the ball next to France's Antoine Griezmann, left, during the final match between France and Croatia. (Photo | AP)
Pussy Riot has just claimed responsibility for the four pitch invaders who disrupted the World Cup final between France and Croatia in Moscow.

The balaclava-clad women of Pussy Riot, a Russian punk rock group, rose to global prominence with their daring outdoor performances critical of Russian President Vladimir Putin in 2012 that sent two members to prison for nearly two years.

details.title: WE'RE INTO STOPPAGE TIME!
details.content: France are inching toward their second FIFA World Cup title! Five minutes of stoppage time to go!

details.title: FRANCE WIN FIFA WORLD CUP 2018!!
details.content: France beat Croatia 4-2 to win the FIFA World Cup final! Congratulations France!
For France, this is the first World Cup crown since winning on home soil in 1998.

France coach Didier Deschamps has been thrown into the air in a celebration by his players after becoming just the third person to win the World Cup as a player and as a coach. Deschamps was captain of the France squad that won the World Cup on home soil in 1998. (Photo | AP)

details.title: WELL DONE CROATIA!
details.content:
Reaching their first ever FIFA World Cup final, Croatia created history this year and won millions of hearts!

Well done, indeed, Croatia!
Presentation ceremony begins.
Kylian Mbappe wins Young Player Award and deservedly so! What a World Cup the teenager has had!

Croatia skipper Luka Modric wins the Golden Ball Award! What a fairy tale for this tiny country's little man!

Croatian President Kolinda Grabar-Kitarovic embraces Croatia's Luka Modric after he received the player of the tournament award. (Photo | AP)
The winners of this year's FIFA World Cup, the French players line up and receive their medals.

details.title: FRANCE LIFT FIFA WORLD CUP TROPHY!!
details.content: Celebrations erupt!
